docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 26 -- President Eisenhower today assured a new Minister from the Hungarian People's Republic to the United States that this country would support any endeavors that would contribute to the well-being of the Hungarian and United...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 26 -- President Eisenhower today assured a new Minister from the Hungarian People's Republic to the United States that this country would support any endeavors that would contribute to the well-being of the Hungarian and United States peoples and promote friendship and understanding between them.

docs.snippet: During a state visit to Paraguay President Peron of Argentina has made a number of speeches and statements which are represented as heralds of a new orientation in his foreign policy. He has repudiated any ambition to set up and lead a regional bloc...
docs.lead_paragraph: During a state visit to Paraguay President Peron of Argentina has made a number of speeches and statements which are represented as heralds of a new orientation in his foreign policy. He has repudiated any ambition to set up and lead a regional bloc against the United States and any attempt to influence other Latin-American countries against us.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Oct. 8 -- Not all the drama of the United Nations is confined to the stage of the General Assembly or to its political stars. Some of it is enacted Tuesdays at 6 P. M. when the United Nations Drama Group, composed of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Oct. 8 -- Not all the drama of the United Nations is confined to the stage of the General Assembly or to its political stars. Some of it is enacted Tuesdays at 6 P. M. when the United Nations Drama Group, composed of the stagestruck among the Secretariat's 4,000 members, meets in the staff lounge for play-reading in languages and accents reflecting many corners of the world.
docs.abstract: Activities of members' play-reading club, UN Drama Group, described; illus; other soc clubs noted
